channel.title: Mrinal Wadhwa
channel.description: Mrinal Wadhwa is founder and CTO of Autonomy, a platform that gives you the ability to create AI products that can autonomously perform long and complex tasks.

item.title: How to make agents succeed
item.description: Controlled iteration is the only way to ship reliable, probabilistic AI agents. Here is a concrete process to build evals, prevent regressions, and choose models with confidence.
